src:
Gagal Eksekusi Penalti, Jesus Jadi Bahan Candaan Netizen
07 Nov 2019, 16:32 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Gabriel Jesus gagal mengeksekusi penalti saat Manchester City ditahan imbang Atalanta. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Striker Manchester City, Gabriel Jesus, gagal mengeksekusi tendangan penalti di laga Liga Champions musim 2019/2020. Kegagalan ini membuat Jesus jadi bahan candaan netizen di media sosial.Man City ditahan imbang 1-1 oleh Atalanta pada laga lanjutan penyisihan Grup C Liga Champions, Kamis (7/11) dini hari WIB. The Citizens sempat membuka keunggulan terlebih dahulu melalui Raheem Sterling yang menerima umpan dari Jesus pada menit ketujuh.Empat menit jelang babak pertama usai, skuat asuhan Pep Guardiola mendapatkan peluang emas usai pemain Atalanta, Josip Ilicic dinyatakan melakukan handball di kotak penalti. Namun Jesus yang menjadi eksekutor gagal menjalankan tugasnya dengan sempurna karena tendangannya melebar ke arah kanan gawang.Eksekusi penalti yang buruk membuat Jesus menjadi bahan candaan netizen di media sosial Twitter. Banyak pula yang melayangkan hujatan pada pemain Brasil tersebut.


Manchester City bermain imbang 1-1 melawan Atalanta di fase grup Liga Champions. (AP Photo/Luca Bruno)

Presenter BT Sport, Gary Lineker mengunggah cuitannya di Twitter dengan mengungkapkan bahwa penalti Jesus adalah yang terburuk.



"Jesus baru saja mengambil salah satu penalti terburuk."



"Saya tidak tahu apakah harus marah atau menertawakan penalti Jesus. Tetapi itu adalah contoh sempurna dari saya yang memberikan jawaban yang salah di kertas ujian ketika saya tahu jawaban yang benar tetapi tetap menulis yang salah."



Ada pula candaan yang dilontarkan oleh akun @ElliotHackney yang mengatakan, "penalti Gabriel Jesus baru saja melewati rumah saya."Sementara itu akun lainnya juga mengungkapkan penalti Jesus merupakan penalti terburuk yang pernah dilihatnya.



Hasil dari pertandingan ini membuat Man City harus menunda langkah ke babak 16 besar Liga Champions. Jesus dkk masih memimpin klasemen sementara Grup C dengan torehan 10 poin atau unggul lima poin dari Shakhtar Donetsk di peringkat kedua. (mcf/jal)
text:
Failed Penalty Execution, Jesus Becomes Netizen's Joke Material
Nov 7 2019, 16:32 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Gabriel Jesus failed to execute a penalty when Manchester City were held to a draw at Atalanta. (AP Photo / Luca Bruno)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Manchester City striker Gabriel Jesus, failed to execute a penalty kick in the 2019/2020 Champions League match. This failure made Jesus a joke for netizens on social media. Man City were held to a 1-1 draw by Atalanta in the Champions League Group C qualifying match on Thursday (7/11) early morning hrs. The Citizens had opened the lead first through Raheem Sterling who received feedback from Jesus in the seventh minute. Four minutes ahead of the first half ended, Pep Guardiola's squad had a golden opportunity after Atalanta player Josip Ilicic was declared to handball in the penalty box. But Jesus who became the executor failed to carry out their duties perfectly because his shot widened towards the right of the goal. A bad penalty execution made Jesus the joke of netizens on Twitter social media. Many also cast blasphemy on the Brazilian player.


Manchester City drew 1-1 against Atalanta in the Champions League group phase. (AP Photo / Luca Bruno)

BT Sport presenter Gary Lineker uploaded his tweet on Twitter by revealing that Jesus' penalty was the worst.



"Jesus has just taken one of the worst penalties."



"I don't know whether to be angry or laugh at Jesus' penalty. But that is a perfect example of me giving the wrong answer on the examination paper when I know the right answer but still writing the wrong one."



There was also a joke made by the @ElliotHackney account that said, "Gabriel Jesus' penalty just passed through my house." Meanwhile another account also revealed that the Jesus penalty was the worst penalty he had ever seen.



The results of this match made Man City have to postpone the move to the last 16 of the Champions League. Jesus et al still lead the Group C standings with a score of 10 points or five points ahead of Shakhtar Donetsk in second place. (mcf / jal)
